backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, public article retrieval, and admin-only CRUD for articles and admission requests.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining how to configure DNS and register a custom domain for the app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the app, manifest, icons, and main script using relative paths.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Internet Identity configuration file declaring permitted alternative authentication origins.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and standalone display settings.
frontend/RELEASE_V7_PROMOTION.md: Checklist outlining build, configuration, and verification steps required to promote Version 7 to production.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_V7.md: Detailed smoke test plan for validating Version 7 in production across public pages, admissions, authentication, and admin access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app's routing structure, theme provider, and toaster, defining public and admin-protected routes with a shared layout.
Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, login, or access-denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for login state and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter basic details and save them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the site's header, navigation, main content area, and footer with branding and links.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Renders primary navigation with responsive desktop/mobile layouts, login button, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/config/youtube.ts: Provides centralized YouTube channel configuration and a helper to generate the feed URL.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminArticle: Implements React Query hooks for CRUD operations on articles and invalidates related caches after mutations.
Checks whether the authenticated caller is an admin using the actor and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useAdmissi: Fetches all admission requests and provides a mutation to delete individual requests with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useSubmitA: Provides a mutation for submitting new admission requests through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/useArticleBy: Fetches a single article by ID via the actor with disabled retries.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/usePublished: Fetches all published articles using the actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/youtube/useYouTubeCha: Fetches and parses a YouTube channel's feed into video objects using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminAdmissions: Admin page for listing and archiving admission requests with UI dialogs and actions.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminArticlesPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, and publishing articles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Dashboard linking to admin article management and admission request pages.
frontend/src/pages/Admissions/Admissions: Renders an admissions form with validation and submission handling, showing a success screen after submission. Uses a mutation hook and UI components for inputs and layout.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticleDetai: Fetches and displays a single article by ID with loading and error states. Provides navigation back to the articles list.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticlesList: Loads and displays a grid of published articles with skeletons, error handling, and clickable cards. Allows navigation to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/Contact/ContactPage.t: Shows contact information with copy-to-clipboard actions and social links. Provides UI cards for WhatsApp, phone, email, and address.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesExams/CoursesE: Displays academic classes and competitive exam offerings with descriptions and subjects. Uses cards and sections to organize course information.
frontend/src/pages/Home/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards highlighting offerings. Includes a hero image and calls to action for admissions and articles.
frontend/src/pages/YouTube/YouTubePage.t: React page showing a YouTube channel feed with loading, error, and video grid states, using a hook to fetch videos and buttons to open links.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utility to generate base-path-aware asset URLs by cleaning paths and prefixing with the app's BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving persisted values, and handling hash-based routing cases.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app purpose, requirements, issues, and version metadata for the Keep Going Classes website.
